_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The consequences of the elements being e: If the earth element were exclusively painful, sentient beings wouldn’t love it.
If the earth element were exclusively pleasurable, sentient beings wouldn’t grow disillusioned with it.
If the water element were exclusively pleasurable, sentient beings wouldn’t grow disillusioned with it.
If the fire element were exclusively pleasurable, sentient beings wouldn’t grow disillusioned with it.
If the air element were exclusively pleasurable, sentient beings wouldn’t grow disillusioned with it.
